name: MMORPG Simulation Demo
description:
A simulation of how communities form in MMORPGs.

Use WASD to move, help other players in need by standing on the circle, call for help when you're in a pinch and defeat the final boss! You can only defeat the boss with your friends!

Make friends and take on bosses!

My game is related to my synthesis in that in order to progress in the game, players must work together to overcome challenges and as they do, form bonds and communities. The best way to meet players is through overcoming the challenges together, or by helping them when they need it. This is shown through the "call for help" button.

Font: Wojciech Kalinowski

Art/Programmer: andrewoid
